item.title: whoami
item.description: Chapter 1 Chapter 2 Ingredients: For the sauce: Worcestershire sauce Ketchup Mustard Steps : Then form crab pâté steaks and brown them in a pan with a drizzle of frying oil for 4 to 5 minutes on each side. Meanwhile, make the sauce. Combine Worcestershire sauce with mustard and ketchup. Taste then change the seasoning if necessary. Reserve the crab pâté steaks on a paper towel and then brown the burger buns for a few minutes.

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m a sea sponge who works as a fry cook at the Krusty Krab: The Krusty Krabe is a fast food restaurant known for it’s signature burger: The Krabby Patty Try to make one yourself and you will be as happy as I am. My first Krabby Patty You can take a look at the recipe here .
